plot: What defines us as the person we think we are? When does inaction become a reaction? There are as many answers as there are people.
plot_es: What defines us as the person we think we are? When does inaction become a reaction? There are as many answers as there are people.
plot_en: What defines us as the person we think we are? When does inaction become a reaction? There are as many answers as there are people.
